about_the_game:
Rise to Prominence, Rock to the Soundtrack!

Immerse yourself in the high-stakes world of Prominence Poker with its official soundtrack. These tracks set the mood for competitive poker play with a mix of songs that capture the thrill of the table and the strategic tension of each hand. Why not jam out on your journey to the top?
detailed_description:
Rise to Prominence, Rock to the Soundtrack!

Immerse yourself in the high-stakes world of Prominence Poker with its official soundtrack. These tracks set the mood for competitive poker play with a mix of songs that capture the thrill of the table and the strategic tension of each hand. Why not jam out on your journey to the top?

name: Prominence Poker - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 156 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space

short_description: The official soundtrack from the hit free-to-play poker game Prominence Poker!
